Title: UK type of contracting authority
Description: The types of contracting authority defined by the the UK's Procurement Act 2023. One of publicAuthorityCentralGovernment, publicAuthoritySubCentralGovernment, publicUndertaking, privateUtility, other.

Title: UK devolved regulations that apply to the contracting authority
Description: Different regulations apply to a contracting authority under the UK's Procurement Act 2023 if a contracting authority operates mainly in Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland and its activities are not reserved. One of GB-NIR, GB-SCT, GB-WLS.
